title: Add site name “Luxury Bazar” to storefront branding

requirements.text: Update the storefront branding to display the site name "Luxury Bazar" in the persistent header (next to the existing logo image) on all pages.

quotes: add the web site name  luxury bazar

acceptanceCriteria: Header shows the text "Luxury Bazar" next to the logo on both desktop and mobile widths.
The header branding remains a single link to the home route ("/").
No navigation links are removed or renamed as part of this change.

requirements.text: Update the HTML document title to "Luxury Bazar" so the browser tab displays the correct site name.

quotes: add the web site name  luxury bazar

acceptanceCriteria: After reload, the browser tab title displays "Luxury Bazar".

requirements.text: Update footer copyright text to include the site name "Luxury Bazar".

quotes: add the web site name  luxury bazar

acceptanceCriteria: Footer displays: "© {currentYear} Luxury Bazar. All rights reserved." (with the current year).
Other existing footer links and the caffeine.ai referral link remain unchanged.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn components).
Do not edit immutable hook/entry files listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts).
nonGoals: Creating or changing the logo image asset.
Changing product/catalog behavior or backend APIs.
